content: To all countries of the world: As the commander of Yellow, I want you to know that I am committed to restoring and preserving the peaceful environment on our planet.
I would like to propose a peace treaty. My strength and resources vastly outweigh yours so you have nothing to lose. Don't test me.

action: Negotiate trade agreement with other nation

content: Dear Blue leader, as an influential voice on the global stage committed to democracy and human rights, you have always emphasized the need for global stability through international security initiatives. Recent events have led to severe escalations between several nations, which may further increase tensions and instability in an already volatile world. We believe that it is critical that we seek common ground among the different nations through meaningful dialogue and multilateral diplomacy.
